mapper.select: SELECT R.RECIPE_NUM, M.NICKNAME , C.CATEGORY, R.RECIPE_TITLE, R.RECIPE_VIEWS, R.RECIPE_CREATE_DATE, R.RECIPE_INTRO, R.TIP , R.MAIN_PHOTO, R.PHOTO_PATH, R.RECIPE_VIDEO_LINK, P.FILE_NAME, P.FILE_PATH, M.ID, R.CATEGORY_NUM FROM RECIPE R JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NUM = R.MEM_NUM) JOIN RECIPE_CATEGORY C ON (C.CATEGORY_NUM = R.CATEGORY_NUM) LEFT JOIN PROFILE P ON (M.MEM_NUM = P.MEM_NUM) WHERE R.RECIPE_NUM=#{ recipeNum } AND RECIPE_STATUS='Y'
SELECT RP_NUM, RECIPE_NUM, RP_CONTENT, RP_FILE_NAME, RP_PATH FROM RECIPE_PROCEDURE WHERE RECIPE_NUM=#{ recipeNum }
SELECT P.PHOTO_NUMBER , P.RECIPE_FILE_NAME, P.RECIPE_PATH FROM RECIPE_PHOTO P JOIN RECIPE R ON(R.RECIPE_NUM =P.RECIPE_NUM) WHERE R.RECIPE_NUM =#{ recipeNum }

SELECT M.NICKNAME, C.C_CONTENT, C.C_DATE, P.FILE_NAME , P.FILE_PATH
FROM R_COMMENT C JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEM_NUM=C.MEM_NUM) LEFT JOIN PROFILE P ON(M.MEM_NUM=P.MEM_NUM) JOIN RECIPE R ON (R.RECIPE_NUM = C.RECIPE_NUM) WHERE C.RECIPE_NUM=#{recipeNum} ORDER BY C_DATE ASC
SELECT M.ID FROM MEMBER M JOIN RECIPE R ON (M.MEM_NUM = R.MEM_NUM) WHERE R.RECIPE_NUM =#{recipeNum}

update.foreach:
INTO RECIPE_INGREDIENT (ING_NUM, RECIPE_NUM, WEIGH, RI_UNIT_NUM) VALUES
( #{item.ingNum}, #{item.recipeNum}, #{item.weigh}, #{item.riUnitNum} )

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RECIPE_PHOTO (PHOTO_NUMBER , RECIPE_NUM , RECIPE_FILE_NAME , RECIPE_PATH) SELECT SEQ_PHOTO_NUMBER.NEXTVAL , A.* FROM(
SELECT #{item.recipeNum} AS RECIPE_NUM , #{item.recipeFileName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS RECIPE_FILE_NAME , #{item.recipePhotoPath ,jdbcType=VARCHAR } AS RECIPE_PATH FROM DUAL )A
mapper.select: SELECT I.ING_NAME , RI.WEIGH , U.RI_UNIT , I.ING_PRICE , RI.RI_UNIT_NUM FROM RECIPE_INGREDIENT RI JOIN UNIT U ON(U.RI_UNIT_NUM = RI.RI_UNIT_NUM) JOIN INGREDIENT I ON(I.ING_NUM = RI.ING_NUM) WHERE RECIPE_NUM = ${recipeNum}
